userBio: Dedicated and inventive Angular Developer with 2 years of comprehensive experience in UI/UX Design & Front-end Development. Passionate about responsive website design and a firm believer in the mobile-first approach. Willing to learn and master NoSQL and Knowledge Management.
userInterests: Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors, travelling & cycling. I am an aspiring chef (I love cooking), and I spend a large amount of my free time watching movies, web series, and exploring the latest technology advancements in the front-end development world.

userEducation.description: Bachelor of Computer Applications is a 3 year undergraduate program that deals with the fundamentals of software development and computer applications. From computer programming to networking, everything is included in the BCA syllabus. Divided into six semesters; I have learned about cutting-edge technologies which are proficient in design and development of information technology tools.

jobDescription: 2 years of professional experience as a Full Stack Developer at Capgemini India.
Strong user interface and user experience skillset, has a passion for developing clean user interfaces and implements the best user experience standards.
Working knowledge of front end optimization and performance techniques.
Working experience of developing REST API based highly interactive web applications.
Experience with general User Experience concepts and the ability to design highly effective user interfaces.
Strong knowledge of modern frontend technologies, best practices, and load speed optimization techniques.
Experience in creating self-contained, reusable and testable modules and components.
Cooperating with the back-end developer in the process of building the RESTful API.
Crisp Communication with Clients and work as an interface between team members and Client counterparts.

responsibilities: Planned, wrote, and debugged web applications and software with complete accuracy.
Reconstructed the legacy project which was developed using PHP & HTML.
Enhanced the legacy application by building new components and modules in Angular.
Migrated and consolidated the application on Angular 8, reducing the load over the server.
Constructed a powerful and modern frontend architecture.
Previously, there were five applications running on different servers which I consolidated the five applications into one single application. Thus, utilizing only a single server.
Designed, developed and planned a validated Login Page along with authentication.
Managed time-sensitive updates, including content changes and database upgrades.
Worked on defect triage where multiple bugs were fixed.
As well as optimized the application.
Developed application for management level to provide an overview of financial health of account.
Created a custom responsive web application from scratch to replace a legacy line-of-business web application using Angular 9.
Enhanced user experience by working on dynamic tables where the table data is loaded as per user choice selection.
Built reusable components across different modules.
Maximized applications’ efficiency, data quality, scope, operability, and flexibility.

otherSkills.description: Strong HTML5, CSS and JavaScript skills with code level experience.
Excellent organizational, problem solving and written/verbal communication skills with fluency in English.
Hands-on experience in Angular 5+, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
Strong interpersonal skills to interact with the customer and team members.
Experience with Java (Spring Boot & API Development).

userAwardsAndAppreciation.awardMessage: STAR Performer 2019: Awarded as Star Performer for my contribution in IBS.
Have received multiple client appreciation for providing out-of-the-box business solutions and approaches for simplifying complex logics.
Received appreciation from management level for my contribution in ALOC UI development.
Achieved recognition for managing complex user stories for UI into simplified versions for execution.
